column1: 531111,General Clerk,,"Answer telephones to direct calls or provide information
column5: Proofread documents, records or other files to ensure accuracy
column11: Search files, databases or reference materials to obtain information
column15: Confer with co-workers or internal stakeholders to coordinate operational activities
column17: Respond to customer problems or complaints
column35: Make travel, accommodation or entertainment arrangements for others
column37: Prepare documentation for contracts, transactions or regulatory compliance
column41: Execute sales or other financial transactions
column43: Prepare cash for deposit or disbursement
column49: Maintain office equipment in proper operating condition
